Posts.Content: Dear Angelica, We hear you sister. Hearing Stage 4 news is like being kicked in the gut. Your strength is to be admired. Thank you for letting us know that you are in a dark space. We care tremendously and want to lift you up.
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc

Posts.Content: Dear Angelica, We hear you sister. Hearing Stage 4 news is like being kicked in the gut. Your strength is to be admired. Thank you for letting us know that you are in a dark space. We care tremendously and want to lift you up. The Jordan Elizabeth Harris Foundation has been very helpful to me. You can call someone at any hour: https://jordanharrisfoundation.org/find-help 1-800-273-TALK (8255) Angelica, you are never alone. God is right beside you. He loves you and will give you peace and joy. "For I am the Lord, your God, who takes hold of your right hand and says to you, Do not fear; I will help you." Isiah 41:13 You are not alone Angelica, Bobbie
Posts.Title: Depressed...tnbc

Posts.Content: Mouth sores prompted a prescription for Gelclair that my insurance would not cover and the charge was $700. Neither my oncologist or the pharmacist mentioned that we can go online and look up our meds and often get a coupon. Also, my drug store has a $20/year prescription savings card that in this 1st instance saved me $700! The copay is $0 with this $20/year card. I surely hope that this brings relief to some of you fellow fighters.
Posts.Title: savings on prescriptions
